edu.rit.pjmr

Class MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pjmr.MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV>
  • Type Parameters:
    IK - Mapper input key data type.
    IV - Mapper input value data type.
    OK - Mapper output key data type.
    OV - Mapper output value data type; must implement interface Vbl.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
extends Object
implements Streamable
    Class MapperConfig contains specifications for configuring a Mapper in a mapper task.

    • Method Detail

      • needsGpu

        public MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> needsGpu()
        Specify that this mapper needs a GPU. If not specified, the default is that the mapper does not need a GPU.
        Returns:
        This mapper config object.

      • mapper

        public <T extends Mapper<IK,IV,OK,OV>> MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> mapper(Class<T> mapperClass,
                                                               String... args)
        Add the given Mapper to this mapper's source. For further information, see SourceConfig.mapper().
        Parameters:
        mapperClass - Mapper class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the mapper.
        Returns:
        Mapper config object for mapperClass.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if mapperClass is null.

      • mapper

        public <T extends Mapper<IK,IV,OK,OV>> MapperConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> mapper(int copies,
                                                               Class<T> mapperClass,
                                                               String... args)
        Add the given number of copies of the given Mapper to this mapper's source. For further information, see SourceConfig.mapper().
        Parameters:
        copies - Number of copies to add (≥ 1).
        mapperClass - Mapper class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the mappers.
        Returns:
        Mapper config object for mapperClass.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if copies < 1.
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if mapperClass is null.

      • source

        public SourceConfig<IK,IV,OK,OV> source(Source<IK,IV> source)
        Add the given Source to this mapper's source's mapper task. For further information, see MapperTaskConfig.source().
        Parameters:
        source - Source.
        Returns:
        Source config object for source.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if source is null.
